name: Bob Block Adventures 2 Demo
description:
Play through 4 different levels in this platformer with a twist. You are controlling Bob Block, a free floating cube. Jump, drive, and roll with the optional local multiplayer! You can now have someone else control Bell Block through 2 levels with Bob Block. 

THIS IS NOT THE FINAL GAME, MORE LEVELS AND FIXES WILL BE ADDED TO THE FULL GAME (coming December 12, 2021)

If your character gets stuck, then press R to reset it.
